website_summaries.verdict: Pretty ceramic mugs, but if you are concerned about chipping, you may want to consider other models on our shortlist.
pros: A set of 6 mugs that sport a fun polka dot pattern and bright colors
Thick ceramic doesn't get hot to the touch
cons: The mugs chip easily and don't keep beverages warm for very long

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are cute and sturdy. I like to have a decent sized cup of coffee, and these fit the bill perfectly. They ended up being heavier than I thought they would be, which is a good thing as far as I'm concerned. When friends come over for coffee, there is never any confusion about which cup belongs to which person.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Andros

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mugs for us and also a great gift !
customer_reviews.text: We love these coffee mugs! In fact, we just bought a second set for ourselves and gave sets to some people we work with. They are sturdy, good looking, large and have a great shape and handles. Very comfortable in your hand. They clean well in the dishwasher... no need for hand washing. And the price is fantastic for the quality. Other purchasers seemed to have had trouble with mugs arriving broken, but all of ours arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: PLC

customer_reviews.title: I am in Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a coffee mug snob! It needs to be big but not too heavy. It has to be white on the inside, my nose has to fit inside the cup with out hitting the other side. The shape must be pleasing in a curved sort of way and all four fingers have to fit around the handle. Microwave and dishwasher safe are also a must. I am obsessed with these mugs!! I am in Love!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Moyes

customer_reviews.title: Family can pick a color & find it when set down!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these cups! First of all they don't burn your hands or mouth after warming something up in the microwave. Second they are the perfect size and fit into all sizes of hands. Third of all we love that each of us get to pick one of the six beautiful colors and can find it when it has been set down. These are what we've been looking for, we love them and totally enjoy using them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: NeeCee

customer_reviews.title: These are big mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I like a big cup of coffee, around 14 ounces. My 12 ounce coffee mugs were too small. These mugs hold 17 ounces when filled to the brim. They're heavy-duty, have a good feel, are easy to hold, but most important they hold enough coffee with plenty of room for milk and sugar. I didn't buy them for style but they look OK, not at all offensive and certainly not gimmicky like the mugs people give at Christmas parties. If you're looking for a set of good, well-made, big mugs, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Adarondax

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as described.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. The quality seems fine, but I was supposed to receive 6 different colored mugs with white polka dots like the picture shows. Instead I received 6 white mugs with various colored polka dots. They looked pretty ugly, and weren't at all what I was expecting. I wanted to give these as a Christmas gift, but I won't take the chance of ordering a replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: Hdlehman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mugs for my kitchen. I just love them! I love polka dots and these are perfect! The mugs are pretty solid and hold 16 oz. Made from stoneware with a nice weight to them.Glad I got them! These mugs are quite sturdy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Thammbone

customer_reviews.title: Cute mugs
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as favor containers for a sleep over birthday party. They were very cute. The dots on one of them was a little off but still very cute. We kept that one and gifted the others. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful colors. The mugs are large and made of ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely mugs, beautiful colors. The mugs are large and made of a sturdy material, they don't feel cheap. They came nicely packaged and none were broken or chipped. I use these almost every day and love them. I'd love to buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: JessBess

customer_reviews.title: 2 cups cracked with 2-3 days of using
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets. They arrived the day before Christmas. Within 3 days 2 of the cups had vertical cracks on the inside leaking fluid. Have already thrown away shipping box; therefore, not going to send one of the sets back. The cups look nice but the quality is poor. The cups were hand washed once arrived and never put in microwave or heated other than pouring hot water in them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Love these, I love everything polka dot so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these,I love everything polka dot so I was very happy ,love the colors and they look great hanging in my kitchen.They are a little bigger than a regular mug so they were perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Angel wygor

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs arrived today, and I was delighted to find that (a) none were broken and (b) the colors are even more vibrant than the photos. I very much enjoyed using my new orange mug today. :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mugs. Just a bit pricey. But I bought them since the other versions are now not available, so maybe these will also start going up in price as well, then vanish.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schjelderup

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and bright! Holds a good amount, no chips, have been used/washed multiple times!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Cute cups. The texture is not smooth: there ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute cups. The texture is not smooth: there are raised areas near the dots but the white dots are not on the raised areas.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these for my mom for Mother's Day. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom for Mother's Day. She loves the size of the mugs and the bright, cheery colors. Unfortunately, she broke one mug within days of receiving them. I reached out to the seller to order a replacement so she'd have a complete set, and instead they sent me an entire new set. My entire family was blown away at the gesture! She is looking forward to enjoying them for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product description was perfect, price was perfect and delivery was perfect. A perfect transaction...
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: You need these !!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and perfect fit for your hand. Colors are bright and vivid and just cheer you up looking at them !! Fun and flirty !! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good colors - in two words - SUPER CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about shipping so close to Christmas and if these would arrive chipped /broken. The mugs arrived very well packaged, in its original box then bubble wrap on the outside. No chips, none broken. These mugs are well made, good colors - in two words - SUPER CUTE!!! I bought these for my niece - she moved and all of her coffee mugs broke. Can't wait for her to open them for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Larry snyder

customer_reviews.title: loved the mugs
customer_reviews.text: loved the mugs. was disappointed that one came cipped and could not be replaced,\. I got a credit for the mug but would rather have had the mug
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups!
customer_reviews.text: Easily hold the advertised 16 oz, with room for cream and sugar. Very nicely made and finished. Have a good hefty feel in your hand. Vivid colors. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Cups have such a wide drinking area that if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Cups have such a wide drinking area that if you are not careful, you have coffee pouring on your self.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Schieffer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these mugs
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these mugs! They hold all the tea I want and they are fabulous! Only wish the blue & purple were in bright tones like the others.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Becky Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Use for morning coffee. Very colorful and provides a nice large cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: lalkove

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the other reviews I was worried that mugs may arrive broken or in same color. But that was not the case. Mugs are so pretty, slightly wider than I wanted but can live with it, all arrived in different vibrant pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: Pratibha Manjunath

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about these mugs
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these mugs! The size, the bright colors, and (although I have not used them yet) – the quality seems excellent! They arrived with no cracks or damage. I am about to place an order for another set. The others were for a gift, but the next set is for me!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I bought these to give to six people as part of a Christmas gift bag (with hot cocoa and some other fun stuff). Now I want to order a set to keep.
customer_reviews.author: MomClrH2o

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mugs. They arrived packaged well and unbroken
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mugs. They arrived packaged well and unbroken. I have been using them for a week and so far so good in the dish washer. The color/finish seems to be holding up just fine. If anything changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: DAP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Mugs well made great colors and dishwasher safe and great size
customer_reviews.author: Dwight A. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Colorful mugs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted colorful mugs for hot drinks and these fit the bill. They have a good weight to them, though polka dots aren't my favorite, they are well used and well liked.
customer_reviews.author: RNMere

customer_reviews.title: Loved the look
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look ,colors and size of the mugs. They are great with my Keurig. They keep coffee warm longer than many of my coffee mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie D.

customer_reviews.title: ... these to my sister for her birthday and she loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my sister for her birthday and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WE love these mugs - large size, sturdy, and beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: "Good to the last drop!"
customer_reviews.text: Great rich colors, a true 16oz cup. Glaze finish is beautiful, no skimping on material. Glad to know they have been cleared of lead and caladium.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Parrett

customer_reviews.title: The quality of these mugs is wonderful. I like them so much I bought another ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these mugs is wonderful. I like them so much I bought another set. I also bought a mug holder to display them on the counter as they are so pretty. They are heavy and very large but I like that.
customer_reviews.author: charlene r

customer_reviews.title: Very successful purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't leave reviews but this was necessary because of all the negative reviews. I was extremely nervous to purchase these but couldn't resist. And I'm so glad I did! These mugs are perfect! Each one was perfect when they arrived no broken pieces and there is now a label on the bottom saying microwave safe and dishwasher safe. Hope this helps others!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty...........
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice cups. I love that they are 16 oz. which allows for a nice cup of soup or a very large cup of coffee. The colors are lovely too - very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use them daily and love how they add color to our solid white dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these mugs
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs! I had seen that sometimes one or more was broken in transit, but mine arrived all in tip top, perfect condition! I love the bright colors and the ample size and they fit in my mug rack perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these coffee mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these coffee mugs. Had looked all over in stores in SF and couldn't find anything I liked. Alas, I dropped the orange cup and it broke : <
customer_reviews.author: Penny Alton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome musgs. Great feel, nice weight, perfecprice. I love them
customer_reviews.author: ink-spot

customer_reviews.title: VERY HIGH QUALITY AND ADORABLE MUGS!
customer_reviews.text: These are the sweetest, best quality mugs out there! The perfect companions to coffee and tea!!
customer_reviews.author: A Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: "C" Cups
customer_reviews.text: After months of use I'm updating the review. Great durability and nice capacity. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Vance

customer_reviews.title: Durable high quality mugs !
customer_reviews.text: They are a little big than what i expected but i love the design. I attached a picture for size reference , with a 16.9 oz arrowhead water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Myn00

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great size and bright colors. Came extremely well packed. Now I need to find dishes to match!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun mugs- Perfect for a large cup of Hot Chocolate with marshmallows!
customer_reviews.author: c3

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors and the way they feel when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the way they feel when I am using them. They wash in the dishwasher beautifully. This is a quality purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Richards

customer_reviews.title: Luv em
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy duty, dishwasher safe, microwavable, and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Billie L.Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes delivered broken and not mixed colors.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as presents for my coworkers and the first box was perfect but the second box I bought had two purple mugs and a broken blue mug. I had to return it and order a new box. Hopefully what I receive on Monday won't be a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Maro

customer_reviews.title: Just as described. I only wish they were a ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I only wish they were a few ounces (capacity) larger.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, nice big handle
customer_reviews.text: Water collects in the bottom rim in dishwasher. Beautiful colors, nice big handle, good capacity at 16 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are as advertised,very cuteGave them as gift and 3 look like seconds with paint overrun on top. They could be sold at tj Maxx.
customer_reviews.author: Patmurphy77

customer_reviews.title: look great. Work well
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, look great. Work well. Have been through the dishwasher several times and seem to be holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: W. Rockhill

customer_reviews.title: they are a nice size and I do like the colors
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy because one of my cups arrived broken...they are a nice size and I do like the colors..
customer_reviews.author: cheryl lamar

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as listed, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My cups came in and they are perfect. They are the right size and the paint details are great. No chips or defects. A very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Deliliah32

customer_reviews.title: Really like them!
customer_reviews.text: Really like them!!! Great for company because you don't get cups mixed up!!! If I knew which category I had ordered them from I would get another set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. I like the look. We'll see how they hold up to the microwave and dishwasher. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: joseph albert wallaert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these mugs. Adorable and sturdy. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Sevillano

customer_reviews.title: Great color and holds a lot of coffee
customer_reviews.text: The family loves these. Great color and holds a lot of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Book Buying Auntie

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite coffee mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs! They are big and feel sturdy in your hand, not the thin ceramic that chips in the dishwasher. The polka dots are not just painted on, they are raised so they wont rub off after using the dishwasher. Also, everyone remembers what color they have so no mixing up our coffee.
customer_reviews.author: cbare

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. They were a gift for my sister and she thought they were very cute.
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can now Cary a cup of coffee to another room without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Eckard

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but not that great
customer_reviews.text: Not so great, purchased 2 sets and ended up returning both of them. Very cheap quality, some had paint blotches, and little dings and dents. Disappointed. Fortunately Amazon offers free returns and free UPS pickups if item is defective. For sure not gift-giving quality. I ended up buying Coastal Blue Shells Starfish Coffee Latte Tea 16 oz Mug Cup and it is significantly classier and doesn't have that cheap feel and look to it. If buying for kids to use I would probably get these though as it wouldn't matter if they break with how inexpensive they are. I wonder if the solid colored ones would have less paint-blotches then the polka dots...
customer_reviews.author: Jared S

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: when package arrived 2 out of my 6 coffee mugs were broken so I couldnt even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: They are absolutely adorable..
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely adorable...My husband and I like a large cup of coffee in the morning and I couldn't find any large cups that I liked. They sure brighten up our kitchen and love the polka dots.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: AWKSOME
customer_reviews.text: These cups were a gift to me from my Grandson for my 70th birthday, saw them wanted them. They are really sharp - I think my coffee even taste better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bright and cheerful, generous in size, handle does not get hot in microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Connie K.

customer_reviews.title: Great size mugs
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are a great size for tea or coffee. Easy to keep track of your mug when guests are over. The handle is large enough to hold comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bright colors and the size of the mugs!
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: One arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Cute mugs at a good price but the green one arrived in pieces. The outer box was in good shape so I suspect the breakage occurred prior to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fredholm

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Mug
customer_reviews.text: i love the colors of these mugs. They do not pick up heat in the microwave. The problem I have is that one of the mugs had a long hairline crack which resulted in a leaky mug.
customer_reviews.author: KRB

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned item. Two cups broken in shipping. Did not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: John H Schliewenz Jr

customer_reviews.title: I love these coffee cups
customer_reviews.text: I love these coffee cups. Especially when we have guests, so we don't have to connect charms to know whose cup is whose. I wish they came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: cre8tive1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandmother and granddaughters all like. Not perfect, but doesn't have to be.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cups but out of the 6
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cups but out of the 6, 1 was chipped and other had a broken handle. Unfortunately i can only use 4 out of 6 cups. Be cautious if you want to buy these as you may get broken ones with the rough handling in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rb1234

customer_reviews.title: Seems like "seconds" quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received my mugs today and upon unboxing noticed the yellow mug's handle is obviously crooked. In addition, the base of the handle has an unfinished, unglazed area where the handle joins the mug. My orange mug also has a few bumps where the ceramic work/mold got sloppy and it was glazed over. For those reasons, I would not give this set as a gift. However, for my use, they're good. They are a good size, pretty colors, comfortable weight and can be used in the microwave without any issues with over heating.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daily

customer_reviews.title: Paint is terrible on mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Mugs are good size, but the paint quality is horrible! There is absolutely no quality control with this company.....thinking about sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these mugs as a gift
customer_reviews.text: While these mugs are large, which is necessary for the person I gifted them to, they are rather poor quality. The painting around the rim is uneven. There are small defects in the finish. The mugs get extremely hot when microwaved. Additionally, they do not come as six different colors as pictured. I felt terrible after learning all this after gifting these mugs as a Christmas present. These mugs, while cute, are not good quality, and I cannot recommend them, especially as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peculiar Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The box with the cups was open and someone placed it on the floor in our garage. My husband thought it was trash and was going to throw it out, but happily he didn't and I rescued them. I think the box was delivered to a neighbor by mistake. They brought it to our house, but never said anything.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K. Stull

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COFFEE CUPS..!
customer_reviews.text: These are EXCELLENT..!!......they are just big enough to use with a K-Cup machine on max setting and still have room for creamer, etc. High quality...and dishwasher safe.......HIGHLY RECOMMEND.....bought a second set as a gift for a friend....
customer_reviews.author: Seen Them All

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy these again
customer_reviews.text: We love these mugs. I bought these along with a sturdy mug tree to replace the crazy collection of mugs that was taking over our kitchen. When these was arrived one had cracks, but the seller replaced it. We have been using these for over a month and haven't had any other cracking problems. The mugs are large (16 oz), the colors are vibrant. We generally hand wash and hang them back on the tree to dry, but they are dishwasher safe and have been through our dishwasher on several occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: These Mugs Are Crushing It
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace a similar single mug that got destroyed by someone knocking it off the counter. These ones are great and better in every way: appealing to look at, not bad to clean, and overall the right size for a solid cup of coffee or tea. The only caveat I would say is that our new dishwasher seems to be stripping the bottom insignias off (e.g., the ones that show where they are from and if they are dishwashable, etc.) I guess those must be on there with just some black enamel that is a lot less sturdy than the main colors. But I mean... I will remember I can dishwash them so I think this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Z N

customer_reviews.title: I just love them. They are big and hold a good ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought these mugs and so many customers received broken mugs. Thank goodness mine were all in one piece. I just love them. They are big and hold a good cup of coffee. I gave my daughter the purple one with her birthday card. She called and said she loved it. I would buy them again if need be. They microwave a cup of coffee just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Zellar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and super cute~ Does NOT get hot in the microwave!
customer_reviews.author: JustUs

customer_reviews.title: Love these cups!
customer_reviews.text: Great cups. These are big and perfect for someone like me who drinks cafe au lait. They're holding up well, and my family isn't exactly what I'd call careful with the dishwasher. I love the cheerful colors, but most of all I like that they can hold a hefty amount of liquid. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: thick sturdy mug, and great size
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, thick sturdy mug, and great size, perfect for Keurig large setting plus room for creamer. One mug arrived broken but the company replaced it with no issues. The colors are vibrant and as matched the pictures and my employees loved them each person in the office now has their own color and no more arguments over sharing cups. Great solution to going green in the office.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: They hold a good amount
customer_reviews.text: These mugs hold a good amount and are sturdy enough for day to day use. I’m not keen on one or two of the colors but not enough to make me return them,
customer_reviews.author: English Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Nice Colors
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are so pretty and a great size. I accidently dropped the purple one, which is my fave color. Didn't really make a difference as they are just the right size for us so any color is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Guy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, sturdy, great mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty mugs, and at 16oz, holds the perfect amount of coffee or whatever else you're drinking. I love the thickness of the ceramic, it "feels good" to drink out of. Love the bright colors!
customer_reviews.author: Book Woman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful large mugs!! They came completely undamaged, which surprised me considering that I think they could have packed them better. Very happy with them. I bought the colored polkadots!! Beautiful mugs!!
customer_reviews.author: SharonF

customer_reviews.title: So cute.  Bright and cheerful larger mug.
customer_reviews.text: My mugs arrived quickly, one of each color shade, no chips or imperfections. We have used them for over a month now, put them through the microwave, and dishwasher with no problems. They are a larger size coffee mug, in a pleasant shape. I also purchased a wire rack (separate purchase-not included with these mugs) to hang my mugs on. They look great sitting on my kitchen counter next to the coffee maker. Cheers me up in the morning, and I get lots of compliments on them when friends visit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin N

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors, durable, but questionable contents
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Bright colors. Large cups. Relatively durable. Only con is there's no markings on them as far as brand, material, safety,etc. They came in a Francois et Mimi box, but other than that they might be china dollar store-style, full of lead. who knows. That's my only concern. Can microwave them without becoming overly hot, which is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: B/D

customer_reviews.title: Cute polka-dots
customer_reviews.text: I love these colorful mugs. They hold a lot of hot beverage, which is what I was looking for. I would have given a rating of a 5 star but the glaze at the rim is a little uneven on a couple of them. I was think the line between the color and the white glaze on the inside should be perfect. Maybe the tiny irregularity just adds to the charm of these mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Van Gogh

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BE FOOLED - These are 6 WHITE mugs with polka dots!
customer_reviews.text: Item is not at all as description. What I received was six white mugs with colored polka dots. Extremely disappointing and not enough time to return as it was a Xmas gift. Totally misrepresentation if product!!!
customer_reviews.author: murr

customer_reviews.title: Love my dots!
customer_reviews.text: So bright and cheerful! Perfect size. Love them so much I ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Paws

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: ahh, I love these big mugs, sadly, just a teeny bump(when hand washing gently) and 1 completely cracked right in half!! Other 5 are holding up so far. These are nice large cups, and cute polka dots!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are very pretty. I have had lots of compliments on them. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Cups are nice and big
customer_reviews.text: Cups are nice and big. They add color to my kitchen. They were delivered in tact and packed very well. Nice cups for a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jacobski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...but.
customer_reviews.text: These cups were in perfect condition, no chips or discolorations, and just adorable. My one observation and what keeps me from giving it five stars is that like another reviewer my yellow cup was missing. I got two purple cups and since purple is my favorite color I will keep them. They are a great size and a true 16 ounce cup.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups. Their generous 16 oz size and cheerful colors brighten my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Francois et Mimi 16-Ounce Ceramic Coffee Mugs, Large, Polka Dot, Set of 6
product_meta.description: Enjoy your morning cup of coffee with these fun and colorful Polka Dot mugs. The large size is sure to satisfy any coffee drinker.
